# UI Audit — “No Default Kit”

## Checklist (all required)
- [ ] Typography scale + letter-spacing policy overridden
- [ ] Spacing rhythm/density modes overridden
- [ ] Radii system overridden
- [ ] Elevation/shadow model overridden
- [ ] Surface colors + borders overridden (dark mode rules if present)
- [ ] Motion presets overridden
